name: Survive: REMASTERED
description:
RECAP:

A long time ago in 2020 holyboi12 made a game called They Turned, in 2021 holyboi12 and AnimeKid567147 formed a team called HolySkullStudios and remade They Turned into Survive. Survives sprites look rushed and not even close to what the guns looked like, and no updates whatsoever after HolySkullStudios tried making Multiplayer, which never worked. They just abandoned the project and holyboi12 left the team, leaving AnimeKid567147, becoming SkullyGames, and now here he is again remaking Survive, holyboi12 joined back into the team helping him, making them now both SkullyGames. P.S. type test if you want more zombies (Speed Zombie and Hell Zombie)

DESCRIPTION:

A classic plain ol zombie shooter game, stay tuned for more updates! If you encounter any bugs please let us know!

CREDITS:

Engine - Scratch

Scripter - Rex Woods/holyboi12

Sprite Maker - SkullyGames/AnimeKid567147
